OOC( For those who want to know, she's a brown recluse spider.  Her
venon is much like the real a real recluse spider, it desolves and
corrodes. Only when mixed with her own web can it be an expolive, but
It won't get used much. She thinks it's cheating to do that too often.)

In the depths of the long forgotten caves, in the dank and dark of the
earth, a vibration is felt. 
A long, brown, spindly leg emerges from a coccoon.  Then another, and
another, and another, until all eight are freed from thier bonds.  
The large golden optics emit a soft glow as they look about the tomb
they were imprisoned in.  
"Ah, at last, free. I am free. Free to feed. Free to get vengence on
those who left me here to die. Now, as my spark pulses, I shall have
my REVENGE! HA HA HA HA HA HA!"
The femme bot transforms into bot mode.  The noticable violin shape
still on her back.  Her legs folded up to give her a fan tail look. 
Her glossy chocolate brown and tan colors melt into the blackness of
her cave.  She walked about, looking for the way out. But the entrance
had caved in so long ago. She let her hand glide over a boulder and
she sighed. "Hmm, well, it will take more than this to stop me."  She
flicked her wrist and shot a small web at the boulder.  With an evil
grin, she spat some of her corrosive venom onto the web and took a few
steps back.  The venom started to disolve the web. The web flashed
red, then with a medium sized explosion, the rocks soon tumbled out of
the way.  Reclusa walked out of the cave in bot mode.  Using her comm
beacon, she turned it on. She would need other bots in order to exact
her revenge on the Maximals who killed her ancestor Arachnia.  
"Now come to me, said the spider to the fly."
